Attention loyal RPGers! Time has come to nominate the best of the best for 
the first annual NOE BEAST WARS AWARDS! These are the categories:

Best RPGer:

Best storyline creator:

Best male character:

Best female charater:

Best arrival sequence:

Best departure/death sequence:

Best Love Story ( basically the two charaters who have had the longest and 
mushyest romance.) :

Best villian:

Best hero:

Best leader overall:

Thats it. So all you have to do is copy and paste this to your own Email and 
type in who you think should get the awards and send it to Yanshosh, 
Kslawdogg, Inferno, Wilddancemare, and myself. Please, do not send it over 
the entire RPG! This will cause a riot and clog up the posts. Thanks. And 
remember the longer you take to do this the farther away the awards will be! 
Hurry!
